entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
